Text: Bread Pudding RecipeLynn Heres the recipe that I was telling you about Its delicious Vincent Prices Bread Pudding Ever since the late actor Vincent Price shared his recipe for bread pudding with chef Bob Blakesly of Rancho Bernardo Inn in San Diego Prices pudding has been on top of the dessert list cup raisins cup brown sugar packed slices white bread eggs beaten cups milk teaspoons vanilla tablespoons unsalted butter diced Crme Anglaise Sprinkle raisins and brown sugar evenly in wellbuttered x inch glass baking dish Line dish with bread slices Set aside Combine eggs milk and vanilla and pour over bread slices Dot with butter Place baking dish in hot water bath Bake at degrees hour or until pudding is firm Serve in squares with Crme Anglaise Make to servings CRME ANGLAISE egg yolks cup sugar cups milk Dash salt teaspoon vanilla Combine egg yolks and sugar Mix thoroughly until smooth Set aside Bring milk to simmer Add salt and vanilla Combine egg mixture with small amount hot milk and return to milk mixture Heat over low heat until thickened stirring constantly Strain and cook Makes cups
